text: Princess Gabriella of Monaco, Countess of Carladès (Gabriella Thérèse Marie; born 10 December 2014), is the twin daughter of Prince Albert II and Princess Charlene. She is second in line to the throne of Monaco. She was born at The Princess Grace Hospital Centre in Monaco. She was born two minutes before her twin brother, Hereditary Prince Jacques. She was granted the title Countess of Carladès, comtesse of Polignac by her father. ==Titles and styles== *10 December 2014 Her Serene Highness The Hereditary Princess of Monaco (17:04 CET-17:06 CET) *10 December 2014-present Her Serene Highness Princess Gabriella of Monaco, Countess of Carlades ==References== |- |- Category:2014 births Category:Living people Category:House of Grimaldi Category:Earls and countesses Category:Princes and princesses of Monaco Category:Royal children
title: Princess Gabriella, Countess of Carladès
